definition[0]: the distance it is possible to see, especially when this is affected by weather conditions
example[0]: Visibility on the roads is down to 20 metres due to heavy fog.
example[1]: The search for survivors was abandoned because of poor visibility.
definition[1]: the situation of being noticed by people in general
example[2]: The exhibition helped increase the visibility of women artists.
definition[2]: the fact of being easy to see
definition[3]: the situation in which people notice a particular company, employee etc
example[4]: A company can gain visibility by fostering boldness, risk taking, and growth.
example[5]: In the past it was more difficult for women to achieve visibility.
